languages.text: "Это утверждение истинно. Брат Тарзус имеет //честь//авторизацию// быть облаченным в священную боевую упряжь, принадлежавшую Магосу Милитанту Ауспектору Гракху, одному из первых //подвижников//священных разведчиков// в деле покорения Простора Коронус. После его //гибели//прерывания жизненных функций// от рук ксеносов его поврежденная броня модели Голиаф была сохранена и наделена реликварным статусом".

"This statement is true. Brother Tarzus has the //honour of wearing//authorisation to wear// the sacred battle harness that belonged to Magos Militant Auspector Gracchus, one of the first //champions of the faith//holy scouts// to join the cause of conquering the Koronus Expanse. After //his death//the termination of his vital functions// at the hands of xenos, his damaged Goliath-class armour was preserved and given the status of a relic."
languages.original_text: "Это утверждение истинно. Брат Тарзус имеет //честь//авторизацию// быть облаченным в священную боевую упряжь, принадлежавшую Магосу Милитанту Ауспектору Гракху, одному из первых //подвижников//священных разведчиков// в деле покорения Простора Коронус. После его //гибели//прерывания жизненных функций// от рук ксеносов его поврежденная броня модели Голиаф была сохранена и наделена реликварным статусом".

languages.text: 「この声明は真実である。同胞ターザスは、コロヌス・エクスパンスを征服する運動に参加した最初の//信念の戦士//聖なる偵察隊//の1人であるマゴス・ミリタント・オースペクター・グラックスに帰属する神聖なる戦闘ハーネスを//着用する栄誉を//着用する許可//を得ている。異種族の手による//彼の死//彼の生体機能の停止//の後、彼の傷ついたゴライアス級アーマーは保存され、聖遺物としてのステータスを与えられた」
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. Brother Tarzus has the //honour of wearing//authorisation to wear// the sacred battle harness that belonged to Magos Militant Auspector Gracchus, one of the first //champions of the faith//holy scouts// to join the cause of conquering the Koronus Expanse. After //his death//the termination of his vital functions// at the hands of xenos, his damaged Goliath-class armour was preserved and given the status of a relic."

traits.locale_text: 「この声明は真実である。同胞ターザスは、コロヌス・エクスパンスを征服する運動に参加した最初の//信念の戦士//聖なる偵察隊//の1人であるマゴス・ミリタント・オースペクター・グラックスに帰属する神聖なる戦闘ハーネスを//着用する栄誉を//着用する許可//を得ている。異種族の手による//彼の死//彼の生体機能の停止//の後、彼の傷ついたゴライアス級アーマーは保存され、聖遺物としてのステータスを与えられた」
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: “这种说法是正确的。塔祖斯兄弟//荣幸地//被授权穿戴//原本属于军事顾问贤者格拉古的神圣战甲。格拉古是最早的//信仰的捍卫者//神圣的侦察兵//其中一员，加入了征服科罗努斯扩区的伟大事业。当他死亡//重要机体功能遭到异形中止//之后，他受损的歌利亚级盔甲被保存下来，被赋予了圣物的地位。”
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. Brother Tarzus has the //honour of wearing//authorisation to wear// the sacred battle harness that belonged to Magos Militant Auspector Gracchus, one of the first //champions of the faith//holy scouts// to join the cause of conquering the Koronus Expanse. After //his death//the termination of his vital functions// at the hands of xenos, his damaged Goliath-class armour was preserved and given the status of a relic."

traits.locale_text: “这种说法是正确的。塔祖斯兄弟//荣幸地//被授权穿戴//原本属于军事顾问贤者格拉古的神圣战甲。格拉古是最早的//信仰的捍卫者//神圣的侦察兵//其中一员，加入了政府科罗努斯扩区的伟大事业。当他死亡//重要机体功能遭到异形中止//之后，他受损的歌利亚级盔甲被保存下来，被赋予了圣物的地位。”
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt. Bruder Tarzus //hat die Ehre//ist autorisiert//, die heilige Kampfpanzerung zu tragen, die einst Magos-Militant Auspector Gracchus gehörte, einem der ersten //Streiter des Glaubens//heiligen Späher//, die an der Eroberung der Koronus-Ausdehnung beteiligt waren. Nach //seinem Tod//der Deaktivierung seiner Vitalfunktionen// durch die Hand von Xenos wurde seine beschädigte Rüstung der Goliath-Klasse bewahrt und zum Relikt erklärt."
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. Brother Tarzus has the //honour of wearing//authorisation to wear// the sacred battle harness that belonged to Magos Militant Auspector Gracchus, one of the first //champions of the faith//holy scouts// to join the cause of conquering the Koronus Expanse. After //his death//the termination of his vital functions// at the hands of xenos, his damaged Goliath-class armour was preserved and given the status of a relic."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt. Bruder Tarzus //hat die Ehre//ist autorisiert//, die heilige Kampfpanzerung zu tragen, die einst Magos-Militant Auspector Gracchus gehörte, einem der ersten //Streiter des Glaubens//heiligen Späher//, die an der Eroberung der Koronus-Ausdehnung beteiligt waren. Nach //seinem Tod//der Deaktivierung seiner Vitalfunktionen// durch die Hand von Xenos wurde seine beschädigte Rüstung der Goliath-Klasse bewahrt und zum Relikt erklärt."
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: « Cette affirmation est exacte. Frère Tarzus a //l'honneur de porter//l'autorisation de revêtir// le harnois de bataille sacré ayant appartenu au magos militant auspector Gracchus, l'un des tout premiers //champions de la foi//éclaireurs sacrés// à s'être investis dans la conquête des Étendues de Koronus. Après //sa mort//la cessation de ses fonctions vitales// aux mains des xénos, son armure de classe Goliath endommagée a été récupérée et s'est vue octroyer le statut de relique. »
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. Brother Tarzus has the //honour of wearing//authorisation to wear// the sacred battle harness that belonged to Magos Militant Auspector Gracchus, one of the first //champions of the faith//holy scouts// to join the cause of conquering the Koronus Expanse. After //his death//the termination of his vital functions// at the hands of xenos, his damaged Goliath-class armour was preserved and given the status of a relic."

traits.locale_text: « Cette affirmation est exacte. Frère Tarzus a //l'honneur de porter//l'autorisation de revêtir// le harnois de bataille sacré ayant appartenu au magos militant auspector Gracchus, l'un des tout premiers //champions de la foi//éclaireurs sacrés// à s'être investis dans la conquête des Étendues de Koronus. Après //sa mort//la cessation de ses fonctions vitales// aux mains des xénos, son armure de classe Goliath endommagée a été récupérée et s'est vue octroyer le statut de relique. »
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: «Esta declaración es cierta. El hermano Tarzus tiene //el honor de vestir//autorización para vestir// el sagrado arnés de combate que perteneció una vez al magos militante Auspector Gracchus, uno de los primeros //adalides de la fe//exploradores santos// que se unieron a la causa de conquistar la Extensión de Koronus. Tras //su muerte//el cese de sus funciones vitales// a manos de los xenos, su armadura dañada modelo Goliath fue preservada y se le otorgó el estatus de reliquia».
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. Brother Tarzus has the //honour of wearing//authorisation to wear// the sacred battle harness that belonged to Magos Militant Auspector Gracchus, one of the first //champions of the faith//holy scouts// to join the cause of conquering the Koronus Expanse. After //his death//the termination of his vital functions// at the hands of xenos, his damaged Goliath-class armour was preserved and given the status of a relic."

traits.locale_text: «Esta declaración es cierta. El hermano Tarzus tiene //el honor de vestir//autorización para vestir// el sagrado arnés de combate que perteneció una vez al magos militante Auspector Gracchus, uno de los primeros //adalides de la fe//exploradores santos// que se unieron a la causa de conquistar la Extensión de Koronus. Tras //su muerte//el cese de sus funciones vitales// a manos de los xenos, su armadura dañada modelo Goliath fue preservada y se le otorgó el estatus de reliquia».
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: "Bu önerme doğru. Tarzus kardeşimiz, Koronus Enginliği'nin fethine dâhil olan ilk //inanç müdafilerinden//kutsal keşif erlerinden// biri olan Magos Militan Auspektör Gracchus'a ait kutsal muharebe giysisini giyme //onuruna//iznine// naildir. Zenoların sebep olduğu //ölümünün//hayati fonksiyonlarının sonlanışının// ardından Gracchus'un hasarlı Golyat sınıfı zırhı korunmuş ve yadigâr statüsü verilmiştir."
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. Brother Tarzus has the //honour of wearing//authorisation to wear// the sacred battle harness that belonged to Magos Militant Auspector Gracchus, one of the first //champions of the faith//holy scouts// to join the cause of conquering the Koronus Expanse. After //his death//the termination of his vital functions// at the hands of xenos, his damaged Goliath-class armour was preserved and given the status of a relic."

traits.locale_text: "Bu önerme doğru. Tarzus kardeşimiz, Koronus Enginliği'nin fethine dâhil olan ilk //inanç müdafilerinden//kutsal keşif erlerinden// biri olan Magos Militan Auspektör Gracchus'a ait kutsal muharebe giysisini giyme //onuruna//iznine// sahiptir. Zenoların sebep olduğu //ölümünün//hayati fonksiyon sonlanmasının// ardından Gracchus'un hasarlı Golyat sınıfı zırhı korunmuş ve yadigâr statüsünde değerlendirilmiştir."
traits.speaker: Opticon22
